quest.name: City of the Mord
journal: Cassard stands at the entrance to Mord Souq, an eager smile on his face.
objectives: Speak with Rhon Ron, and browse the available wares.

dialogue.name: CASSARD
dialogue.text: Mord Souq... Not just full of Mord, but Humes and all manner of others, too! It has long been a refuge for folk displaced by the Flood, so the population is nothing if not diverse.

dialogue.name: CASSARD
dialogue.text: Oh, have you met a Mord before? They might look like shifty little blighters, but a more welcoming lot you could never wish to meet!

dialogue.name: CASSARD
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, we should pay our respects to Master Ghen Gen. I'll go ahead and let him know we've arrived.

dialogue.name: CASSARD
dialogue.text: Go on! Introduce yourself to Master Ghen Gen!

dialogue.name: CASSARD
dialogue.text: A full Voeburtite honor seems a bit rich for buying a dented pan or a bowl of worms. Did the Exarch lose to you at cards or something!?

dialogue.name: GHENGEN
dialogue.text: Rhon Ron's shop is best for eating! Crack your coinpurse and gorge on the delicious delicacies!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Welcome to Rhon Ron's, traveler! I have wares to empty your purse and fill your belly!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Take your time! Stare and sniff before you choose! But no drooling on the merchandise, yes?

dialogue.name: SYTEM
dialogue.text: Browse Rhon Ron's wares. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target a foodstuff and inspect it with [???] / [???].

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: They all look tasty, yes? Which to choose, which to choose!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Which to choose?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Mushloaf.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Everburning Bounty.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Chewy Skewer.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Glazed Wriggler.

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Ah, very wise! You won't wither on the sands with a gut full of cactus fruit filling!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: You have the gold...?

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: ...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you forty loaves of bread!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Yes, put some spice in your step! You won't feel the cold this night...and probably not the next one either!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: You have the gold...?

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: ...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you ten sides of lizard meat!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Mmm, chewy! A quick, easy meal to carry you across the desert!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: You have the gold...?

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: ...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you sixty-five skewers!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Too good to resist, eh? (That's what I would've chosen!)

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: You have the gold...?

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: ...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you fifteen jars!

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Will you eat the lot?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Every last mouthful!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I think I'll...sh-share...the rest...

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: What an appetite! What a belly! A new legend is born in Mord Souq!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Our visitor invites us to feast! Let us give thanks for herhis great generosity─and small appetite!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: Consider your coinpurse cracked! I am pleased to accept your custom, and Ghen Gen will be pleased that you honored ours!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: ...Keeping the merchandise down, yes? No returns!

dialogue.name: RHONRON
dialogue.text: I am honored to have been chosen! Go to Ghen Gen! Let him know that your coinpurse has been most decidedly cracked.

dialogue.name: CASSARD
dialogue.text: I've never seen anyone eat so much of Rhon Ron's “cuisine” in one sitting... You've a stronger stomach than I!

dialogue.name: GHENGEN
dialogue.text: I was watching from here, Forename! You honored our custom, and with great relish!

dialogue.name: GHENGEN
dialogue.text: You will always be welcome in Mord Souq─if you need anything in Amh Araeng, we are here to provide!
